## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] CloudFormation templates pass cfn-lint
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] IAM policies follow least-privilege principle
- [ ] Resources have appropriate tags

### Documentation
- [ ] CAPABILITY.md updated for all changed products
- [ ] Business context documented
- [ ] Functional capabilities documented
- [ ] Technical implementation documented
- [ ] Interfaces (inputs/outputs) documented
- [ ] Constraints documented

### Testing
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Integration tests added/updated
- [ ] All tests pass locally

### Deployment
- [ ] Changes validated with `deploy.py validate`
- [ ] Deployment plan reviewed with `deploy.py plan`
